text: @GovCTW @Yemayah777 @realDonaldTrump Many people think COVID-19 is a Hoax. More people die from the flu per year. What they don't take into consideration is A) flu numbers accumulate over a whole year B)  these numbers are after social distancing C) the death rate is ten times higher D) there "IS" a flu vaccination.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
